sources.title: Darkened Rooms (1929) NEIL HAMILTONüçï EVELYN BRENT
sources.description:
It's Friday@PizzaFLIX 
Stars: Neil Hamilton, Evelyn Brent, Doris Hill
Director: Louis J. Gasnier
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLmHgXUJMN1TXEBMtSqYpWfok-xg95KXao
Before he shocked the nation with Reefer Madness, director Louis J. Gasnier took a walk on the Supernatural side with this rare gem from Paramount Pictures.

You may know him as Commissioner Gordon, but Neil Hamilton‚Äôs career didn‚Äôt begin on the small screen with Batman ‚Äò66. In this pre-code mystery, he delivers a compelling turn as a boardwalk photographer caught in a web of spiritualistic fraud and deception. With the haunting Evelyn Brent at his side as a phony clairvoyant, it‚Äôs an atmospheric tale where con men, say-ances, and lost souls  
collide. Doris Hill and David Newell round out the cast with memorable roles that add depth and intrigue. 

Are you a PizzaFLIX Fanatic? Join our exclusive Fan Club for dedicated Classic movie lovers: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCE34fwgW7kWr7tc7YiOWtRw/join

üçï Be sure to LIKE, COMMENT, and SUBSCRIBE for more rare, vintage films every Friday on PizzaFLIX.

Whether you're a fan of pre-Code mysteries or vintage Hollywood, this film is a must-watch piece of cinematic history. Don‚Äôt forget to like, comment, and subscribe for more classic movies and restored treasures!

#DarkenedRooms #EvelynBrent #NeilHamilton #ClassicMovies #pre-CodeHollywood #spiritualism #clairvoyant #Louis J. Gasnier #MysteryFilm #paramount  #PizzaFLIX

metadata.Plot: A phony "medium" uses an actual clairvoyant to fleece desperate and unsuspecting victims.
metadata.Writer: Philip Gibbs, Patrick Kearney, Melville Baker
metadata.Actors: Evelyn Brent, Neil Hamilton, Doris Hill
